SELECT B.BLDG_ID, B.RENTAL_PTY_ID, B.BLDG_NM, B.BLDG_ZIP_NO, B.BLDG_ADDR, B.BLDG_DTL_ADDR, B.BLDG_TYPE_CODE, B.BLDG_FLR_CNT, B.BLDG_UNIT_CNT, B.BLDG_CMPLTN_DT, B.BLDG_GROSS_AREA, B.BLDG_IMG_PATH,
T.RENTAL_PTY_BANK_NM, T.RENTAL_PTY_ACCT_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_ID T_RENTAL_PTY_ID
FROM BUILDING B LEFT JOIN TENANCY T ON B.RENTAL_PTY_ID = T.RENTAL_PTY_ID WHERE B.RENTAL_PTY_ID = #{rentalPtyId} ORDER BY B.BLDG_ID ASC

SELECT U.UNIT_ID, U.BLDG_ID, U.RENTAL_PTY_ID, U.UNIT_FLR_NO, U.UNIT_CMAR, U.UNIT_XUAR, U.UNIT_DSR_MNTH_RENT_AMT, U.UNIT_DSR_SALE_AMT, U.UNIT_DPST_AMT, U.UNIT_DTL_DESC_CN, U.UNIT_STAT_CD, B.BLDG_NM, B.BLDG_IMG_PATH, T.RENTAL_PTY_ID, T.RENTAL_PTY_BIZ_REG_FILE_PATH, T.RENTAL_PTY_REG_BLDG_CNT, T.RENTAL_PTY_ACCT_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_BIZ_REG_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_FILE, T.RENTAL_PTY_FILE2, T.LSR_YN_TYPE_CD, T.RENTAL_PTY_BANK_NM, T.LSR_TYPE_GROUP_CD FROM UNIT U JOIN BUILDING B ON U.BLDG_ID = B.BLDG_ID JOIN TENANCY T ON U.RENTAL_PTY_ID = T.RENTAL_PTY_ID WHERE U.UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
mapper.update: UPDATE UNIT SET BLDG_ID = #{bldgId}, RENTAL_PTY_ID = #{rentalPtyId}, UNIT_FLR_NO = #{unitFlrNo}, UNIT_CMAR = #{unitCmar}, UNIT_XUAR = #{unitXuar}, UNIT_DSR_MNTH_RENT_AMT = #{unitDsrMnthRentAmt}, UNIT_DSR_SALE_AMT = #{unitDsrSaleAmt}, UNIT_DPST_AMT = #{unitDpstAmt}, UNIT_DTL_DESC_CN = #{unitDtlDescCn}, UNIT_STAT_CD = #{unitStatCd} WHERE UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
